span.font:
Import PSD directly
Without Photoshop, drag and drop the PSD file
into DragonBones Pro to import it.

IK Timeline
With IK timeline, you can add keyframe for
IK bend and weight.
New export UI with texture preview area

"Export to"
Set the export destination flexibly.
Refine replace image workflow and UI
Copy and Paste cross projects and armatures

Paste Special
Set the paste contents flexibly.

Customize color of bone
Each bone can be set to different color.
Publish HTML, and embed it into WIX.com.

- Jump keyframe in timeline : Y and H
- Transform toolbar, switch input box : Tab
- Show/Hide Guides : Ctrl/Cmd + ;
- Turn on/off guides moveable : Ctrl/Cmd + Alt + ;
- Trun on/off timeline filter : Ctrl/Cmd +D
- Rename : F2
- Copy Transform : Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + C
- Paste Transform : Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + V
